scripts.vectors:all:gen: npm run vectors:plonk:gen && npm run vectors:zokrates:gen
scripts.smoke:all: npm run smoke:groth16 && npm run smoke:plonk && npm run smoke:zokrates
scripts.verify:groth16:valid:dump: npm run dump:clear && node dist/index.js verify --adapter snarkjs-groth16 --verification ../core/schemas/tests/vectors/mvs/verification/snarkjs-groth16/valid --json --use-exit-codes --dump-normalized ./.tmp/normalized
scripts.verify:groth16:invalid:dump: npm run dump:clear && node dist/index.js verify --adapter snarkjs-groth16 --verification ../core/schemas/tests/vectors/mvs/verification/snarkjs-groth16/invalid --json --use-exit-codes --dump-normalized ./.tmp/normalized
scripts.verify:plonk:valid:dump: npm run dump:clear && node dist/index.js verify --adapter snarkjs-plonk --verification ../core/schemas/tests/vectors/mvs/verification/snarkjs-plonk/valid --json --use-exit-codes --dump-normalized ./.tmp/normalized
scripts.verify:plonk:invalid:dump: npm run dump:clear && node dist/index.js verify --adapter snarkjs-plonk --verification ../core/schemas/tests/vectors/mvs/verification/snarkjs-plonk/invalid --json --use-exit-codes --dump-normalized ./.tmp/normalized
scripts.verify:zokrates:valid:dump: npm run dump:clear && node dist/index.js verify --adapter zokrates-groth16 --verification ../core/schemas/tests/vectors/mvs/verification/zokrates-groth16/valid --json --use-exit-codes --dump-normalized ./.tmp/normalized
scripts.verify:zokrates:invalid:dump: npm run dump:clear && node dist/index.js verify --adapter zokrates-groth16 --verification ../core/schemas/tests/vectors/mvs/verification/zokrates-groth16/invalid --json --use-exit-codes --dump-normalized ./.tmp/normalized
